full_summary:
**Title (English & French)**: Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Network for Office of Energy Research and Development (OERD) Program Planning Support
--------------------------------------------------------
### Procurement Details
* **Record Number (Numéro de dossier)**: NRCan-5000071369
* **Tender Title (Titre de l'appel d'offres)**: TSPS Network Support for OERD Program Planning
* **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: December 14, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date (Date limite d'appel d'offres)**: January 26, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) Number**: PW-22-01017238 (Last Update: January 13, 2023 - 3nd Amendment)

### Bid Procedures and Requirements
This Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) is for procurement service, which is subject to a quarterly refresh cycle in the TSPS Method of Supply (MOS). This solicitation is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who were qualified under Tier 1 for the following categories: 
* Level 2.3 Business Consultant
* Level 2.11 Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist
* Level 2.14 Subject Matter Expert
* Level 2.15 Facilitator Consultant
* Level 3.2 Project Manager
* Level 3.3 Project Leader

The following SA Holders were invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture inc.
* ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* ...

### Proposal Submission and Evaluation Criteria
Proposal submissions and selection criteria will be in accordance with the SA expiry dates. In order to determine the evaluation criteria, it is required that the proposer attend a bidder’s conference.

### Duration and Security Requirements
The proposed duration of the contract is from the contract award date to March 31, 2024 and option periods are from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2028. The required minimum security level for the business is Protected B and for resources is Protected B.

### Points of Contact
More information about the TSPS method of supply and how to become a qualified Supply Arrangement Holder can be obtained from SPTS. Inquiries may be directed to:

* Mulligan, Jason
